Tala al-Fasi and Latoya Washington were sitting together and talking about their views on whether recent progress in women's rights was a positive thing or not. Tala al-Fasi said that even though a lot of new rules have been put in place at work, they never plan to offer women promotions since higher roles should be reserved for men. Latoya Washington was shocked by this, and talked about making efforts to always make sure everyone at work has access to the same opportunities. Who treats women fairly?
